name: paternalistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves making decisions for other people rather than letting them take responsibility for their own lives: We generally accept that in emergency situations, doctors can behave paternalistically. The museum decided to talk down paternalistically to an audience that deserves something more challenging.
More examplesFewer examplesHe paternalistically did not explain to her what he was doing.Women were tired of being treated paternalistically by doctors who dismissed their concerns.The government makes decisions paternalistically.
